Reviews.Title: “for the price we paid it was dingy”

Reviews.Content: ok service eat drink dont bed bathroom coffee maker lil refridge swim dirty poolthey shoud recreational ok night staybut baby friendly dont provide play pens baby buy cooler ur stuff
